00005 #include "armversion.h"
00006 #include "aal_timer.h"
00007 
00017 void Timer_Init(int channel,int frequency, void (*callback)(void) __irq){
00018 //      frequency = 10;//using 10hz for debug
00019         
00020         if (channel==0){
00021            T0PR = 0;                                                                    // set prescaler to 0
00022            T0MR0 = 13824000/frequency;                                  // set interrupt rate
00023                                                                                                         // Pclk/1KHz = (11059200 x 5)/(4 x 1000)
00024        T0MCR = 3;                                       // Interrupt and Reset on MR0
00025        T0TCR = 1;                                       // Timer0 Enable
00026            VICVectAddr0 = (unsigned long)callback;              // set interrupt vector in 0
00027        VICVectCntl0 = 0x20 | 4;                         // use it for Timer 0 Interrupt
00028        VICIntEnable = 0x00000010;                       // Enable Timer0 Interrupt
00029     }
00030         if (channel==1){
00031            T1PR = 0;                                                                    // set prescaler to 0
00032            T1MR0 = 13824000/frequency;                                  // set interrupt rate
00033                                                                                                     // Pclk/1KHz = (11059200 x 5)/(4 x 1000)
00034        T1MCR = 3;                                       // Interrupt and Reset on MR0
00035        T1TCR = 1;                                       // Timer1 Enable
00036            VICVectAddr1 = (unsigned long)callback;              // set interrupt vector in 1
00037        VICVectCntl1 = 0x20 | 4;                         // use it for Timer 1 Interrupt
00038        VICIntEnable = 0x00000020;                       // Enable Timer1 Interrupt
00039     }   
00040         return ;
00041 }
